{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1979 |Team=Tulane Green Wave |Image= |ImageSize=150 |Conference=Independent |Division= |ShortConference= |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=9-3 |ConfRecord=2-1 |HeadCoach=[[Larry Smith (football coach)|Larry Smith]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Louisiana Superdome]] |Champion= |BowlTourney=[[1979 Liberty Bowl|Liberty Bowl]] |BowlTourneyResult= Loss, 6-9 vs. [[Penn State Nittany Lions football|Penn State]] }} The '''1979 Tulane Green Wave football team''' represented [[Tulane University]] in the 1979 college football season. The Green Wave competed in the Liberty Bowl but lost. The offense scored 318 points while the defense allowed 179 points. Two members of the Green Wave team were drafted into the National Football League.
==Regular season== *In the [[Battle for the Rag]], Tulane beat [[LSU Tigers football|LSU]] by a score of 24-13. ===Schedule=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#063003;color:#CCEEFF;" | '''Game''' || '''Date''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Result''' || '''Green Wave points''' || '''Opponents''' || '''Record''' |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 1 ||Sept. 8 || Stanford|| Win || 33 || 10 || 1-0 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 2 || Sept. 15 ||@ Rice || Loss ||17 || 21 ||1-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 3 || Sept. 22|| @ Texas Christian|| Win || 33 ||19 ||2-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 4 || Sept. 29 ||Southern Methodist || Win || 24 || 17 ||3-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 5 || Oct. 6||Vanderbilt || Win || 42 || 14 ||4-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 6 ||Oct. 13|| @ Southern Mississippi|| Win || 20 || 19 ||5-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 7 || Oct. 20||@ West Virginia || Loss || 17 || 27 ||5-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 8 || Oct. 27|| Georgia Tech|| Win || 12 || 7 ||6-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 9 ||Nov. 3|| @ Boston College|| Win || 43 || 8 ||7-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 10 ||Nov. 10||Mississippi || Win || 49 || 15 ||8-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 11 ||Nov. 24||Louisiana State || Win || 24 || 13 ||9-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" |}<ref> http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=342&season=1979 </ref>
